div.p: This code system http://phr.kanta.fi/fiphr-cs-fitnesscategory defines the following codes:

tr.td: Fitness or physical activity observations measure the patient's fitness indicators: resting heart rate, maximum heart rate, active time exercised, sedentary behaviour, sleep episodes, calories burned, distance reached or steps taken. Measures can be timed over arbitrary periods (sessions) or over a day or week.
